search_query: Museu de Arte Moderna Rio de Janeiro museum
page_title: Museum of Modern Art, Rio de Janeiro
extract: The Museum of Modern Art of Rio de Janeiro (Portuguese: Museu de Arte Moderna do Rio de Janeiro, MAM) is a museum located in northeastern Flamengo Park, in the city of Rio de Janeiro, Brazil. It is in the Centro district, west of Santos Dumont Airport, on Guanabara Bay.
